item.title: Spring Boot metrics with Prometheus and Grafana in OpenShift
item.description: In this post I'll discuss how to monitor spring boot application metrics using Prometheus and Grafana. Prometheus Prometheus is a monitoring system which collects metrics from configured targets at given intervals. Grafana Grafana is an open source metric analytics & visualization tool. Micrometer Micrometer is a metrics instrumentation library for JVM-based applications. Spring Boot Actuator Spring Boot Actuator helps you monitor and manage your application when itâ€™s pushed to production. You can choose to manage and monitor your application using HTTP or JMX endpoints.
